channel.title: Pi Coinshare Problem
channel.description: Ok so im using Deathlypvpz v3 base. And i got coinshare to working but, it splits certain items. It will split dragon claws etc. But will not split other items such as torva/pernix/virtus. And the torva/pernix/virtus has a value on them. Maybe im overlooking something idk. Help plz REP++

item.title: Pi Coinshare Problem
item.dc:creator: @Venge_Drop Venge Drop
item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

it doesnt. item id’s are below 20000

Read full topic

item.title: Pi Coinshare Problem
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

If your Torva, Pernix and Virtus have item Id’s above 20000, check if the lootshare covers items that high.

Read full topic
